    • reconnectPlayer

      public int reconnectPlayer(String nickname, Sender newSender) throws SpecifiedPlayerNotDisconnected, NicknameNotInMatch
      Handles the reconnection of a player that was disconnected during the match
      Parameters:
      nickname - Nickname of the player to reconnect
      newSender - New sender of the player
      Returns:
      ID of the player that reconnected
      Throws:
      SpecifiedPlayerNotDisconnected - If the player is not disconnected
      NicknameNotInMatch - If the nickname is not in the match

    • startGame

      public void startGame(int playerID, boolean isReconnecting) throws StarterCardNotSetException
      Starts the game after all players have completed their setup
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that reconnected or was last to complete his setup
      isReconnecting - True if the player is reconnecting, false otherwise
      Throws:
      StarterCardNotSetException - If the starter card of the player is not set
